content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetScopeHostnames path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/cdn/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/scopes/{scope_id}/hostnames content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name scopeid
desc a scope id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name pagerequestfirst
desc the number of items desired
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestafter
desc the cursor value after which data will be returned
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestfilter
desc sqlstyle constraint filters
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestsortby
desc sort the response by the given field
in query
required false
schema
type str
name disabletransparentmode
desc whether or not to load hostnames from a cdn sites cdn scope or its waf scope when true this call loads scope hostnames from a cdn sites scope instead of loading from a cdn sites waf scope if the site has waf service
in query
required false
schema
type bool
format bool
sum get all scope hostnames
desc hostnames allow the cdn to recognize an http request and associate it with a cdn site
responses
200
cdngetscopehostnamesresponse
type obj
props

type obj
props

type str
desc the total number of items in the dataset
haspreviouspage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not a previous page of data exists
hasnextpage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not another page of data is available
startcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the first item in the set of data returned
endcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the last item in the set of data returned
desc information about a paginated response

this is modeled after the graphql relay spec to support both cursor based pagination and traditional offset based pagination
results
type arr
cdnhostname
type obj
domain
type str
desc a hosts domain name
desc an individual hostname
desc the requested scope hostnames
desc the response from a request to retrieve a cdn site scopes associated hostnames
title: 7_Configuration_GetScopeHostnames_41.json
